item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 22, 2024 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Math is still catching up to the genius of Ramanujan (248 points | 126 comments)
2. LTESniffer: An Open-Source LTE Downlink/Uplink Eavesdropper (71 points | 5 comments)
3. First images from Euclid are in (311 points | 99 comments)
4. An amateur historian has discovered a long-lost short story by Bram Stoker (237 points | 91 comments)
5. A Controversial Rare-Book Dealer Tries to Rewrite His Own Ending (4 points | discuss)
6. Building a Game with the Real Engine (26 points | 4 comments)
7. Learning to Learn (37 points | 11 comments)
8. Civet: A Superset of TypeScript (78 points | 69 comments)
9. Scalene: A high-performance, high-precision CPU, GPU, memory profiler for Python (71 points | 6 comments)
10. Apple's AirPods Pro hearing health features (96 points | 52 comments)
11. Show HN: Data Formulator – AI-powered data visualization from Microsoft Research (60 points | 3 comments)
12. Overengineering a way to know if people are in my university's CS lab (131 points | 62 comments)
13. Show HN: Epublifier – scrape pages (books, manuals) for offline reading (262 points | 40 comments)
14. Thought experiments that fray the fabric of space-time (73 points | 86 comments)
15. Transitioning the Use of Cryptographic Algorithms and Key Lengths (57 points | 20 comments)

17. New discovery reveals how diatoms capture CO2 so effectively (43 points | 7 comments)
18. Paranormasight: A Game Exploring the Depths of Honjo in Tokyo (9 points | discuss)
19. Ask HN: In 2024 what's the best way to manage contacts? (38 points | 28 comments)
20. Wired's Attack on Privacy (66 points | 26 comments)
21. Study offers clues into when and why mosquitoes bite (18 points | 19 comments)
22. Transformers Utilization in Chart Understanding: A Review of Advances and Future (10 points | 1 comment)
23. World-first therapy using donor cells sends autoimmune diseases into remission (30 points | 6 comments)
24. Show HN: Floating point arithmetic types in C++ for any size and any base (66 points | 23 comments)
25. A near impossible literacy test Louisiana used to suppress the black vote (63 points | 55 comments)
26. Please do not write below the line (288 points | 232 comments)
27. Egypt declared malaria-free after 100-year effort (534 points | 57 comments)
28. IOCCC Flight Simulator (2010) (152 points | 22 comments)
29. ByteDance sacks intern for sabotaging AI project (141 points | 165 comments)
30. Good money, no team tactics and cute dogs: the rise of pro cycling freelancers (8 points | 3 comments)
